title: Continuous file scanning?
body:
So I opened my client and it downloaded a small patch. Then it went on to scan over 2500 files.

Help?

replies.body: 2500 files ? thats f**k all so dont worry i have to scan over 15,000 be happy yours doesnt take 2 hours+

Hey Gambol Shroud,

If your patcher is still scanning files, please try the solutions provided in the thread below:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues
